/usr/bin/cc     CMakeFiles/calcl_gl_mod2CA3D.dir/source/mod2CA3D.c.o  -o ../bin/calcl_gl_mod2CA3D  -L/usr/local/cuda/lib64/libOpenCL.so -rdynamic /usr/local/opencal-1.0/lib/libopencal.so /usr/local/opencal-1.0/lib/libopencal-cl.so /usr/local/opencal-1.0/lib/libopencal-gl.so -lm -lGLU -lGL -lglut -lpthread /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libOpenCL.so -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib64/libOpenCL.so:/usr/local/opencal-1.0/lib:/usr/local/cuda/lib64
